instructions: Put the dinner plate right in the middle of the table cloth<br>
put the salad plate above the dinner plate, right in the middle of it
put the closed napkin above the salad plate. Right in the middle.
put the wine glass in the upper right corner of the table cloth
Put the water glass perpendicular to the glass of wine
Put the salad fork with its prone pointing at the flowers
Put the dinner fork parallel to the salad fork
Put the dinner knife vertically with its blade pointing to the wine glass
put the soup spoon parallel to the dinner knife below the water glass
